source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video captures a transition from an above-water to an underwater perspective. The video begins with a water-level view of a tropical beach with palm trees and buildings at the base of a green hill. The camera then dips below the surface, revealing a clear, turquoise underwater world with a sandy bottom and a school of fish swimming by.
